title: Painting Pixels
description: This video looks at how to make a painting from a live video source by reading the pixels to color shapes moving around a p5.js canvas.

codeExamples.title: Painting with Pixels Array
codeExamples.description: The sketch demonstrates how to use get() to color shapes from video pixels.
